pullrequest.title: Unify emitters, decouple Iface and Gui

content.raw:
Ok, so that issue was introduced when I moved from `click` to `on('click'` to get the tests to pass. I still have no idea why event delegation wasn't working during normal use but worked for the tests, and after much debugging I decided to revert back to `click` and change the test instead (ac62a28).

The key to get the test working was to only allow jQuery to execute its ready function (where we setup a bunch of `click`s) after the test fixture had been loaded. And that was way more complicated than I expected.
